DOC.brief_summary: Introduction: the peripheral obstructive arterial disease is an condition that affects around 15% of the world population interfering in muscle strength, life quality and functional capacity of patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Different Protocols of Physical Training on Levels of Muscle Strength and Functional Capacity
DOC.detailed_description: Study aim: to assess three methods of physical training (strength training, aerobic training and electrical stimulation training) in muscle strength, functional capacity and life quality of patients with peripheral obstructive arterial disease
